THREAD LIFT TREATMENTS

How is the thread lift application process carried out?

  1. We will conduct an initial consultation and evaluation where you will share your goals, and we will answer all your questions about the procedure.
  2. We will carefully study and mark the insertion points in the area you want to improve.
  3. Once these steps are completed, we will apply local anesthesia to begin the procedure.
  4. We insert the thread lifts using special cannulas.
  5. Finally, we adjust and secure the threads to ensure everything is perfect.

Would you like more information, such as the price of thread lifts?

If you have any questions or would like more details about how thread lift treatments work, their cost, or potential risks, contact me now. I’ll be happy to assist you. Schedule your appointment now

Benefits of Facial Thread Lift Treatments

By undergoing your facial treatment with Dr. Tatiana Leal, you will enjoy:

  • Immediate lifting effect: With visible results from the first session.
  • Collagen stimulation:Improving the texture and firmness of your skin over time.
  • A minimally invasive procedure: With fewer risks than traditional surgery.
  • Quick recovery:You can resume your daily activities almost immediately.

Eliminate sagging in cheeks and jawline, expression lines, wrinkles, nasolabial folds, and excess chin and neck fat once and for all.

💡Both thread lifts and bio-stimulators can be applied to the face, neck, and body areas prone to sagging, such as arms, inner thighs, and abdomen.

What is the cost of thread lift treatments in Colombia?

The cost of facial thread lifts may vary depending on different factors, but in general, this facial treatment ranges between 1,360,000 and 1,500,000 Colombian pesos.

If you want to know the exact price of your personalized treatment, schedule a consultation, and we will help you find the price that best suits your needs.

Frequently Asked Questions About Thread Lift Procedures

The procedure generally takes between 20 and 40 minutes, depending on the number of threads and the areas to be treated.

The procedure is performed under local anesthesia, which minimizes discomfort. Some patients may experience a slight feeling of tightness or pressure during the procedure, but it is generally not considered very painful.

Results from facial thread lifts usually last between 12 and 18 months. However, this may vary depending on the type of threads used, the patient’s skin quality, and post-treatment care.

Most patients can resume normal activities after 24–48 hours. However, it is recommended to avoid intense exercise and facial treatments for at least a week.

The most common side effects are mild swelling, redness, and a feeling of tightness. These effects are temporary and resolve within a few days.

Thread lifts are designed to be invisible once placed. In rare cases, individuals with very thin skin may feel them slightly to the touch, but they are not visible.
